Hetu
Saññojanagocchaka, Kusalattika
Saññojaniyaduka, Kusalattika
Abyākatapada
Pañhāvāra
Hetu
16.
1732Saññojaniyo abyākato dhammo saññojaniyassa abyākatassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. (1)
1733Asaññojaniyo abyākato dhammo asaññojaniyassa abyākatassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo…  tīṇi. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
17.
1734Hetuyā cattāri, ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā cattāri…pe…  avigate satta. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
